item.title: The perfect home office setup for work
item.description:
I know most people cannot work productively at home. Someone finds it difficult to organize themselves. Others canâ€™t make the right schedule to work at home. For others, the work environment at home (or a cafe) is just not optimized for work in general.

So, now I want to describe the ideal setup that inspires me to be productive work at home. Find my most essential tips below on how to set up a productive home office:
